nodes.text: Comedians were entertainers who used humor to entertain audiences in venues such as nightclubs. In Tapani sector, Herglic comedians often teamed up with Mrlssi, and much of their humor derived from the differing sizes and masses of the two species. Despite being generally successful, Herglic often found the jokes to be in poor taste, while the Mrlssi found them to be amusing.
